code: import React from'react';import{fetchMeetupList,fetchValidUsers}from'../services/services';import LogoutPage from'./LogoutPage';import Refresh from'./Refresh';import DeleteUser from'./DeleteUser';import CreateMeetupButton from'./CreateMeetupButton';import CreatedMeetup from'./CreatedMeetup';import InvitedMeetup from'./InvitedMeetup';var UserHome=function UserHome(_ref){var state=_ref.state,onCreate=_ref.onCreate,onUpdate=_ref.onUpdate,onLogout=_ref.onLogout,onDetails=_ref.onDetails,onMeetupUpdate=_ref.onMeetupUpdate;var createMeetup=function createMeetup(){fetchValidUsers().then(function(user){onCreate(user,'');}).catch(function(error){onCreate({},error.code);});};var meetupList=function meetupList(){fetchMeetupList(state.username).then(function(meetup){onUpdate(meetup.createMeetups,meetup.invitedMeetups,'');}).catch(function(error){onUpdate([],[],error.code);});};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"user-home-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"navigation-button"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CreateMeetupButton,{onCreateMeetup:createMeetup}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(DeleteUser,{state:state,onDelete:onLogout}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(LogoutPage,{state:state,onUserLogout:onLogout})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"created-meetup"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CreatedMeetup,{state:state,details:onDetails,update:onUpdate,meetupUpdate:onMeetupUpdate})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"invited-meetup"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(InvitedMeetup,{state:state,details:onDetails,update:onUpdate})));/*<Refresh onRefresh={meetupList}/> */};export default UserHome;
